name: Gemini Crisis
description:
Refraction Man is a character with the ability to interact with alternate versions of himself.  In the incident which gave him these abilities, a device called the Gemini Engine became unstable.  Refraction Man must use his new powers and his new allies to stop the Gemini Engine from overloading and causing a Gemini Crisis. 

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Shift

Music by Soft and Furious

Art, Programming, and Design by Alex Huard
